title: THEY FINALLY DID IT
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/25707ce52341deefca018c0de093a4f6.png

https://i.gyazo.com/79cad4e2bf594eb6777e1a7f985570f7.png

THEY FINALLY DID IT THIS IS SO IMPORTANT

This is a QoL change that people have been asking for FOREVER

Sona's Dimminuendo power chord makes you do less damage and for the longest time there is very little clarity with the ability (the person doing less damage didn't know of it besides a green particle)

AND NOW IT'S IN
